Html: Any idea on the next official release?
Good question. To be honest; don't know. Depends on my free time (very limited at the moment). The next big thing is updates to the navigation stack and the introduction of a navigation service.
Thanks, I've used this on a couple of apps now and I mus say it's a pretty good framework, highly recommended using Caliburn MVVM framework though.
Yes it is, I can't wait with the implementation of navigation service. Thanks kozw!
